mapper.select: select q.question_id, question_type, question_describe, question_answer, question_score, question_limit_time, c.course_number as "course.courseNumber", course_name as "course.courseName", course_create_time as "course.courseCreateTime", course_end_time as "course.courseEndTime", teacher_id as "course.teacher.teacherId" from question q, course c where q.course_number = c.course_number and q.course_number = #{courseNumber}

select q.question_id, question_type, question_describe, question_answer, question_score, question_limit_time, c.course_number as "course.courseNumber", course_name as "course.courseName", course_create_time as "course.courseCreateTime", course_end_time as "course.courseEndTime", teacher_id as "course.teacher.teacherId" from question q, course c where q.course_number = c.course_number and q.question_id = #{questionId}
